Messages.Win up to 50 Free spins in the Seduction: Win up to 50 Free Spins in the Seduction Battle

Messages.Choose between two modes\nBlood Queen fo:
Choose between two modes
Blood Queen for Shifting Expanding Wilds & Van Hell for Sticky Spreading Wilds.

Messages.Choose between Van Hell and the Blood Qu: Choose between Van Hell and the Blood Queen

Messages.You win by matching symbols on win lines: You win by matching symbols on win lines. All symbols must be matched on consecutive reels from left to right. Only the highest win on each line will be paid. Malfunction voids all pays and plays. See game rules for more details.

Messages.The wild appears on any top position of: The Wild can appear in the top position of any reels and will expands to cover the reel.

Messages.It completes and substitutes all the ico: Wilds substitute for all symbols except for Free Spin.

Messages.More than 1 wild can appear at the same: More than 1 Wild can appear at the same time.

Messages.Free spin symbols can appear on any posi: Free Spin symbols can appear in any position on the reels.

Messages.Van Hell&#39;s Holy Water expanding stic: Van Hell's Holy Water expanding sticky wild

Messages.Depending on the initial Free spin game: Depending on your initial Free Spin game selection, (Van Hell or Blood Queen) two different Wild symbols might be displayed during the Free Spin game.

Messages.The holy water symbol activates the stic: The Holy Water symbol activates the sticky wild spreading animation.

Messages.Each spin, the number of sticky wilds wi: After Holy Water appears it will spread each spin until it covers 4 symbols then it will vanish for the next spin.

Messages.Spreading animation starts vertically an: Spreading animation starts vertically and moves horizontally towards the center.

Messages.The blood potion wild icon appears on th: The Blood Potion wild appears on the top of reels 2,3,4 and expands covering the reel.

Messages.Each spin, the wild reel will shift left: Each spin, the wild reel will shift leftwards and vanishes after it reaches the first reel.

Messages.More than one wild reel can be displayed: More than one wild reel can be displayed on the reels at the same time.
